title: [K-12] Design-Based Integrated Mathematics Education for Strengthening Critical Media Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device utilization skills and understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Curriculum focused on media content analysis through mathematics and cultivating critical thinking, combining online/offline activities to strengthen real-life problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically analyze statistical data in media messages to identify biases.
Learners can critically evaluate information delivery in media content by applying mathematical modeling.

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
